description: Application for a non-material amendment to amend the description of planning application 20/00782/OUTM to reduce the number of residential units forming the Full application from 86 to 47 and increase the number of units forming in outline application from 514 to 553. The parent permission being for a Section 73 application for a minor material amendment to vary the approved parameters and design codes approved under parent permission 14/02155/OUTM. The parent permission being for full planning permission for the provision of new site accesses and access roads, a 3-Form Entry Primary School (4,300 sqm GEA), 86 residential dwellings (Use Class C3) (up to a maximum of 8,926 sqm GIA) and an ecology/grassland area in Phase 1 with outline planning permission in 3 subsequent phases (with all matters reserved except for access) for up to a maximum 540sqm GEA of ancillary non-residential floorspace (Use Classes A1, A2, A3, B1 and/or D1) and up to a further 514 residential dwellings (Use Class C3) (up to a maximum of 64,505 sqm GIA) together with associated works including informal and formal open space; pedestrian and cyclist infrastructure; car and cycle parking.
